study.name: Newcastle Digital Twin
study.Description: In a world first, a new project aiming to create a computer replica of an entire city will allow experts to perform real-time resilience testing to see how its infrastructure will perform in the face of challenges such as climate change and population growth.
study.3D Platform Features: Flooding Information; Infrastructure Closure; Hospital Impact
study.Decision Making: Predict freak weather events; Provide information about which buildings/area will be flooded, which infrastructure will be closed down, hospitals that could be affected.
